ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois stood around in the brig. It seemed hopeless, as Hell Beast would have no mercy on him. Just then, Terminess called him over to her side of the room.

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
Message-ID: <8jbl4d+isdu@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1979
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: minime_316@...

Vulois stood around in the brig. It seemed hopeless, as Hell Beast 
would have no mercy on him. Just then, Terminess called him over to 
her side of the room. She whipered to him.

"Listen, we're finished. Predacon trails are unfair, we know that. We 
are going to be convicted of treason, and we are going to die. So I 
have an idea to go out fighting. Look.

She opens a compartment in her body where she was hiding a small box.

"This is an explosive. It contains c4 and other high explosives. It 
is so compacted that slightest touches could set it off. We could set 
it off in here. It would kill us in the process, but it would aslo 
take out that other guy in the brig, the two guys guarding the door, 
and severly damage Hell Beast and the other Preds inside my lab. On 
top of that, it would leave a gaping hole in the base, with a good 
chance that other factions would attack and seize the base. What do 
you say?"

Vulois thought about it. He could take on final swing at Hell Beast 
before he went.

"Let's do it."

"Great. Now, normally the shields would keep the explosion inside 
this room, but if we put it over in that corner, it would destroy 
this room's shield generator, leaving it open."

Terminess put the box down in the corner. Vulois sat down beside it, 
and thought about all the things he had done. His loyal Decepticon 
service. Finding the Matrix. Coming here. Finding the TM3 Driver. 
Meeting Soundwave, Battera and Terminess. Then making his mistake: 
Joining Hell Beast.

Vulois punched the box, with all his strength, setting off the 
explosion.

(Now, this is almost the conclusion to the first part of Vulois. He's 
not dead yet, don't worry. You can put Terminess down on the deceased 
page, she served her purpose. She doesn't technically "die" but we 
won't see her anymore. As for Vulois, he will take a drastic change 
tomorrow, which will be my last post before vacation. Battera and 
Soundwave, get ready because it pertains to you.)
